description: This course continues the study in creative composition begun in 223 and 324 and includes writing for large ensembles. This course may be repeated. Prerequisite: Music 221, 223, 324, and permission of instructor. Generally offered every semester.
name: Composition III
prerequisites: Music 221, 223, 324, and permission of instructor. Generally offered every semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 221, 223, 324, and permission of instructor. Generally offered every semester.
